overview: In order to stop the demon Rakshasa from descending into the world and overturning it into an icy purgatory, Huihai, a disciple of Shaolin Temple, embarks on a journey to find the hero who will subdue the dragon.  The childhood sweetheart Shangguan Lingsu  is always there to protect and help Hui Hai to break the demons and learn the spirit of Shaolin to restore peace and vitality to the world.
title: Shaolin Conquering Demons
